Package gobblin.compliance.purger

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommitPolicy<T>  
    PurgeableDataset  
    PurgePolicy<T>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HivePurgerCommitPolicy
    Default commit policy for purger.
    HivePurgerConverter
    A Converter to build compliance purge queries.
    HivePurgerExtractor
    This extractor doesn't extract anything, but is used to instantiate and pass PurgeableHivePartitionDataset to the converter.
    HivePurgerPolicy
    A policy class to determine if a dataset should be purged or not.
    HivePurgerPublisher
    The Publisher moves COMMITTED WorkUnitState to SUCCESSFUL, otherwise FAILED.
    HivePurgerQueryTemplate
    This class creates all queries required by HivePurgerConverter
    HivePurgerSource
    This class creates WorkUnits and assigns exactly one partition to each of them.
    HivePurgerWriter
    This class is responsible for executing all purge queries and altering the partition location if the original partition is not modified during the current execution.
    HivePurgerWriterBuilder
    Initializes HivePurgerWriter
    PurgeableHivePartitionDataset
    A purgeable representation of HivePartitionDataset
    PurgeableHivePartitionDatasetSchema
    Dummy class for schema corresponding to PurgeableHivePartitionDataset
